name: Orange Juice
description: 100% pure and natural orange juice, freshly squeezed for a refreshing burst of citrus flavor.

name: Apple Juice
description: Made from crisp and sweet apples, this juice offers the taste of a bountiful orchard in every sip.

name: Grape Juice
description: Rich and sweet grape juice, reminiscent of vineyard goodness, with no added sugars.

name: Pineapple Juice
description: Enjoy the essence of the tropics with this pineapple juice, delivering a sunny and tropical escape in every sip.

name: Mango Juice
description: Pure mango goodness, made from ripe Alphonso mangoes, offering a sweet and tropical flavor.

name: Cranberry Juice
description: A tart and tangy cranberry juice known for its health benefits and refreshing taste.

name: Ginger Lemonade
description: A zesty blend of lemon and ginger, providing a refreshing and invigorating twist on traditional lemonade.

name: Carrot Juice
description: A healthy and nutritious carrot juice, packed with vitamins and minerals for a vibrant lifestyle.

name: Tomato Juice
description: A classic tomato juice, known for its rich tomato flavor and versatility in cocktails and recipes.

name: Blueberry Juice
description: Made from plump and juicy blueberries, this juice is bursting with antioxidants and fruity goodness.
